revision.text: Possibly: The inoculator; or, Suttonian system of inoculation, fully set forth in a plain and familiar manner. By Daniel Sutton, surgeon, Who introduced the New Method of Inoculation into this Kingdom in the Year 1763. (London : Printed for the author, by T. Gillet, Bartholomew Close, and sold by C. Dilly, in the Poultry, and J. Owen, Piccadilly, 1796). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2507208~S1
